pages.text: 27|77|Ara niscaya eti muminadera jan'ya hedayata o rahamata.
27|78|Apanara raba to tamra bidhana anuyayi tadera madhye phayasala kare debena. Ara tini parakramasali, sarbajna.
27|79|Sutaram allah‌ra upara nirbhara karuna; apani to spasta satye pratisthita.
27|80|Mrtake to apani sonate parabena na [1], badhirake'o parabena na daka sunate, yakhana tara pitha phiriye cale yaya.
27|81|Apani andhaderake'o tadera patha bhrastata theke pathe anate parabena na. Apani to kebala taderake sonate parabena, yara amadera nidarsanabalite imana ane. Atahpara tara'i atmasamarpanakari.

27|82|Ara yakhana tadera upara ghosita sasti asabe takhana amara tadera jan'ya yamina theke eka jiba bera karaba [1], ya tadera sathe katha balabe [2] ye, manusa amadera nidarsanasamuhe niscita bisbasa karata na.

27|83|Ara smarana karuna se dinera katha, yedina amara samabeta karaba pratyeka sampradaya theke ekekati dalake, yara amara nidarsanabali pratyakhyana karata atahpara taderake saribad'dhabhabe ekatrita kara habe [1].

27|84|Sesa paryanta yakhana tara ese yabe takhana allah‌ taderake balabena, ‘tomara ki amara nidarsana pratyakhyana karechile, athaca ta tomara jnane ayatta karate parani [1]? Naki tomara ara kichu karechile [2]?’
27|85|Ara yulumera karane tadera upara ghosita sasti ese parabe; phale tara kichu'i balate parabe na.
27|86|Tara ki dekhe na ye, amara rata srsti karechi tadera bisramera jan'ya ebam dinake karechi drsyamana? Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche emana sampradayera jan'ya yara imana ane [1].

27|87|Ara yedina singaya phumka deya habe, sedina asamanasamuha o yaminera sakale'i bhita-bihbala haye parabe [1], tabe allah‌ yaderake ca'ibena tara byatita [2] ebam sakala'i tamra kache asabe hina abasthaya.

27|88|Ara apani parbatamala dekhachena, mane karachena, seta acala, athaca ogulo habe meghapunjera n'yaya calamana [1]. Eta allah‌ra'i srsti-naipunya, yini samasta kichuke'i karechena susama [2]. Tomara ya kara niscaya tini se samparke samyaka abahita.
